column6: Peter Parker has a study date with Liz Allen all the way across town that he may not be able to make. But Spidey sure can! Spider-Man hits a snag though, when Scorpion comes out of nowhere to take everyone's favorite Spider-themed hero downtown!
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | penciller (cover):Tony Daniel | inker:Norman Lee | writer:Sean McKeever | penciller:Patrick Scherberger
